mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p1.*, p2.* FROM transaction t join person p1 ON t.sellerId = p1.id JOIN person p2 ON t.buyerId = p2.id WHERE t.sellerId = #{sellerId} AND t.auctionNum = #{auctionNum};
UPDATE transaction SET state='f' WHERE auctionNum = #{auctionNum};

SELECT t.transactionNum, t.sellerId, t.auctionNum, t.price, t.date, t.state, c.companyName as companyName, c.id as companyId FROM Transaction t JOIN Company c ON t.buyerId = c.id WHERE c.id = #{companyId}
SELECT * FROM PERSON WHERE id = (SELECT id FROM AUCTION WHERE auctionNum = #{auctionNum})
SELECT a.maxSalary FROM transaction t JOIN auction a ON t.auctionNum = a.auctionNum WHERE t.buyerId = #{companyId};
